none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 17, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
A new week, a new dose of deadly bombastic blown to shit noisy hardcore? Yes, exactly. Vocals ripped from the throats of self indulgent crust lords and tortured to submission while a guitar/bass/drums outfit uses traditional instrumentation manifest actual death and real world destruction. TRAUMATIZED either sound like real life demons or a crew of punks more than willing to steamroll over whatever you thought you knew about punishment. Check the guitar riff coming out of the instrumental bridges in "Nine To Five" and tell me I'm wrong.Â  TRAUMATIZED

seo.title: Traumatized - Traumatized 6-song demo - Terminal Escape
